scene.name: Chessboard setup
scene.description: A standard chessboard with pieces in the starting position

task.name: Play and restore chess pieces
task.description: Make legal chess moves to scramble, then manually pick and place pieces to reset
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will play chess. The goal is to make legal moves to scramble the board, and then put the pieces back to their starting positions.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要下国际象棋。目标是按规则走几步打乱棋盘，然后直接把棋子搬回原位。

subtasks.description: Execute legal moves and then reset manually
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please make moves according to the rules, then reset the board.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请按规则走棋，然后复原棋盘。

steps.description: Move White Pawn from e2 to e4 (Legal Move)
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: move the white pawn from e2 forward two squares to e4.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：按规则，将白色兵从e2向前走两格，走到e4。

steps.description: Move Black Knight from g8 to f6 (Legal Move)
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: move the black knight from g8 to f6.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：按规则，将黑色马从g8跳到f6。

steps.description: Pick up Black Knight and place it back on g8 (Direct Reset)
steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: pick up the black knight and place it directly back on g8.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：拿起黑色马，直接把它放回g8原位。

steps.description: Pick up White Pawn and place it back on e2 (Direct Reset)
steps.spoken_prompt: Step four: pick up the white pawn and place it directly back on e2.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第四步：拿起白色兵，直接把它放回e2原位。

constraints.notes: Steps 1 & 2 must follow chess rules (e.g., Knight jumps); Steps 3 & 4 are direct pick-and-place actions for restoration.
